description: A rich melt-in-the-mouth stew which is packed with flavoursome veggies like parsnip and mushroom and served with creamy mash and beans.
name: Rich Beef Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return meat and bacon to the pan with mushrooms. Stir in tomato purée. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to a gentle simmer, cover and cook for 1 1/2 -2 hrs, until meat is very tender. Serve with steamed beans and mashed potato.
